Technical Issues and Frustrations I don’t know why, but I’ve been experiencing a lot of issues with Obsidian and Hugo. Fixing these issues in Obsidian took a lot of time, and on top of that, I ended up destroying my GitHub commit history due to a submodule issue.
Additionally, GitHub Pages was removing the PNG assets, so I had to destroy that setup. Now, Iâ€™m using Cloudflare Pages, but the assets are still presentâ€”just not working. I plan to deploy the site to Vercel as well, in hopes that it will work better.
Now, Iâ€™m just tired of it all.
it is around 6 and i have fixed most issues with the blog and updated it’s domains lets see if it works.
Music for the Moment By the way, Iâ€™ve also been listening to the song NEONI - Darkside (Lyrics).mp4 to keep me going through all the frustration.
summary:
Technical Issues and Frustrations

I don’t know why, but I’ve been experiencing a lot of issues with Obsidian and Hugo. Fixing these issues in Obsidian took a lot of time, and on top of that, I ended up destroying my GitHub commit history due to a submodule issue.

Additionally, GitHub Pages was removing the PNG assets, so I had to destroy that setup. Now, Iâ€™m using Cloudflare Pages, but the assets are still presentâ€”just not working. I plan to deploy the site to Vercel as well, in hopes that it will work better.
